name: Sigma Gamepad
description: The Google Stadia Controller offers seamless gaming with wireless Bluetooth connectivity. Easily switch to Bluetooth mode for continued gaming on various devices even after Stadia shutdown. With a user-friendly design

name: RPM Euro Games Keyboard
description: RPM Euro Games keyboards are wired keyboards that are suitable for gaming and office use. They come in different models with varying features.

name: Acer 109cm(43 inches)
description: The Acer 43-inch (109 cm) TV offers a versatile and immersive viewing experience with its large screen size and vibrant display quality. This model typically features a 4K UHD resolution, providing crystal-clear picture quality and enhanced detail.

name: boAt Wave Sigma Smartwatch
description: The boAt Wave Sigma Smartwatch features a sleek design with a vibrant touchscreen display. It offers a variety of fitness tracking features, including heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and multiple sports modes.

name: Wings Phantom Truly Wireless
description: The Wings Phantom Truly Wireless Earphones deliver high-quality sound with deep bass and clear treble. These earphones come with a comfortable and secure fit, making them ideal for workouts and daily use.

name: OnePlus Pad (11.61 inch)
description: The OnePlus Pad features an 11.61-inch display, providing a large and immersive screen for both work and entertainment. It boasts a powerful processor, ample RAM, and long battery life, ensuring smooth performance and multitasking capabilities.
